product.name: Bamboo Floating Nightstand with Drawer & Open Shelf - Fully Assembled Wall Mounted Bedside Table with Modern Design for Bedroom and Small Spaces - FSC Certified Bamboo Side Table
product.bullet_points:
• SPACE SAVING BEDROOM NIGHTSTAND: Our floating night stand is the perfect solution for small spaces. The wall-mounted design of our modern side table gives you the flexibility to place it at any height, freeing up floor space and creating a clean and organized look in your bedroom.
• MODERN NIGHTSTAND: The clean lines and minimalist design of this floating side table complement a variety of decor styles, including contemporary, scandinavian or japandi furniture. Its natural bamboo finish adds warmth and elegance to any bedroom. Prepare for an elevated bedroom experience with our elegant floating nightstands.
• STURDY & DURABLE: Made from durable bamboo, this bamboo nightstand is built to last. Bamboo is naturally sturdy and resistant to moisture, ensuring long-lasting use and easy maintenance. Our bamboo is FSC certified, guaranteeing that it has been sustainably sourced and harvested. So not only does it offer exceptional durability, but our hanging nighstand also supports responsible forestry practices.
• VERSATILE STORAGE: The included drawer provides a convenient spot to store your nighttime essentials such as books, glasses, and phone chargers. The spacious top surface of our curved nighstand is ideal for displaying a lamp, alarm clock, or decorative items. This wall mount nightstand is a perfect storage element to add to your living room or on each side of your bed. It can be used as vanity table, entryway wall cabinet or a bedroom nightstand.
• EASY INSTALLATION: No need to spend hours assembling furniture. Our floating bedside nightstand comes fully assembled and includes all necessary mounting hardware for easy installation in under an hour. Simply mount the assembled nightstand to the wall using the provided screws and anchors.
